opinions.snippet:
POLLOCK, J.
This appeal presents two issues. The first is whether the statute of limitations, N.J.S.A. 2A:14-2, bars a patient’s claim for lack of informed consent against an ophthalmologist who implanted an intraocular lens in the patient’s eye, the hospital at which the implantation took place, and the manufacturer of the intraocu-lar lens. opinions.snippet:
BAIRD, Judge,
dissenting.
On original submission we held the Equal Protection Clause of the Fourteenth Amendment prohibits the use of peremptory challenges on the basis of religion. We granted rehearing to determine the limited issue of whether we misapplied First Amendment jurisprudence in reaching that holding.
